Package eu.opends.traffic

Class AnimationController

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.traffic.AnimationController
public class AnimationController
extends java.lang.Object
Animates multi mesh models with multiple AnimControllers.
Author:
Tommi S.E. Laukkanen

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AnimationController​(com.jme3.scene.Spatial character)
    Constructor which gets animation controls from character spatial recursively and create animation channels.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationController

      public AnimationController​(com.jme3.scene.Spatial character)
      Constructor which gets animation controls from character spatial recursively and create animation channels.
      Parameters:
      character - the character spatial

  • Method Details

    • animate

      public void animate​(java.lang.String animationName, float speedMultiplier, float blendTime, int loopCount)
      Plays animation.
      Parameters:
      animationName - the animation
      speedMultiplier - the speed multiplier (1 = animation native speed, 2 = double speed...)
      blendTime - the blend time in seconds
      loopCount - the loop count or 0 for infinite looping

    • getSpatialNamesWithAnimations

      public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getSpatialNamesWithAnimations()
      Gets list of spatial names with animations.
      Returns:
      list of spatial names

    • getAnimControl

      public com.jme3.anim.AnimComposer getAnimControl​(java.lang.String spatialName)
      Gets animation control with spatial name.
      Parameters:
      spatialName - the spatial name
      Returns:
      the animation control or null

    • getAnimationName

      public java.lang.String getAnimationName()
      Gets last animation played.
      Returns:
      the last animation name or null

    • update

      public void update​(float tpf)
      Updates animation manually.
      Parameters:
      tpf - time per frame

    • setAnimationListener

      public void setAnimationListener​(AnimationListener animationListener)
      Sets character animator listener.
      Parameters:
      animationListener - the character animator listener
